captions.text: It's coming to me by chance
I can see the scent of spring
You must be coming with it
Your scent from far away
On the tip of my excited nose, my lips
What a good feeling, these butterflies
Before I know it, it's spring by chance
Uh, it's spring after winter already
I'm still like a statue in front of you
I still can't believe this
But my left hand bears the scent of you
The mood filled with tension
I still can't breathe right
Unlike on the stage, I can't look at you straight
I sigh at myself for turning my head
This feeling I haven't felt in a while, makes me think simple
The distance only you can know
I forget what I prepared to say, stuttering again
But I won't say anything I can't be responsible for
Tell me what you want, and I'll do it only for you
I can color the world black, except you
I'll go slow, go closer to you
It's coming to me by chance
I can see the scent of spring
You must be coming with it
Your scent from far away
On the tip of my excited nose, my lips
What a good feeling, these butterflies
Before I know it, it's spring by chance
I love you so, I love you
So easy
But I'll wait
I'll wait one more day, since I'm a girl
You silly, tell me
I can see how you feel
Tell me you want me
Don't hide anymore
You're here in front of me, in my sight now
What a good feeling, these butterflies
Before I know it, it's spring by chance

Girl Who Sees Smell
Loco + GFRIEND (yuju) = Spring Is Gone by chance

comments.author: seda halıcı

comments.text:
SPOILER ALERT :3 hehe 

The BAR CODE SERIAL KILLER is none other than the CHIEF. I have this huge 
instinct, strong feeling that it's him. His killer smile <3 doesn't fool 
me. Though I don't want to believe it. Must say, his acting skills are just 
PERFECT. Though you can tell when his lying and pretty nervous. (Still on 
episode 4) 

Comes across as innocent but i can assure you, that's not all. 

ARGHHHHHHH ... I can't wait for the next episode! It just has to be him. No 
way in hell is the doc the killer. He seems to give off a lot of negative 
vibes but there's something about him, something that just says no - it 
can't be. His approach, his way of dealing with things, his body language, 
the tone of voice, his attitude - EVERYTHING. It must be his past and 
indeed it is. I just can't believe the fool didn't RUN. I don't even know 
if his dead ... there's no trace of him. 

Tune in *winks* to find out who is the evil - cunning, malevolent culprit? 
Who is to be blamed ...﻿

suggested The Girl With Scent Vision 😢
